description:
The day of the Handshake Event is approaching. For the 77th generation trainees, it will be their debut. One day, a fan letter arrives for Orine, generating much excitement among Nagisa and her friends. However, the contents of the letter shock Orine, Nagisa, and the rest of the girls. Shaken by the letter, Orine is lifeless during their lessons.
Source: crunchyroll
